latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Not Required

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient number of toilets and sinks for the number of children in attendance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection lavatory facilities failed to be provided with child high/accessible toilets and sinks
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish

At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
Child care service observed utilizing chairs and other equipment not of suitable size for children in attendance on day of inspection
